elements.label: Idle Interest
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 1</color></size>

<the air is laced with polite disinterest, both from the visitors and the guards.>

elements.label: <Eyes Fixed>
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 2</color></size>

<Heckles have been raised, haunches elbowed, and all gaurds stand at attention.>

elements.label: <Actively Scanning>
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 3</color></size>

<They know they are looking for something, and some may even know it is me.>

elements.label: <High Alarm>
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 4</color></size>

<Our group is identified, and calls are made for our seizure>
